Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:
Initially, you are given a JSON object where all values are set to 0. Based on the provided play-by-play breakdown and team-player data, you will update these key statistics in JSON format.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:
Initially, you are given a JSON object where all values are set to 0. Based on the provided play-by-play breakdown and team-player data, you will update these key statistics in JSON format.
{"Buffalo Bills": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}, "Chicago Bears": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}}

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:
Initially, you are given a JSON object where all values are set to 0. Based on the provided play-by-play breakdown and team-player data, you will update these key statistics in JSON format.
{"Green Bay Packers": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}, "Seattle Seahawks": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}}

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:
Initially, you are given a JSON object where all values are set to 0. Based on the provided play-by-play breakdown and team-player data, you will update these key statistics in JSON format.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:
Initially, you are given a JSON object where all values are set to 0. Based on the provided play-by-play breakdown and team-player data, you will update these key statistics in JSON format.
{"Chicago Bears": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}, "Cleveland Browns": {"passing-yards": 0, "passing-completion": 0, "passing-attempt": 0, "passing-touchdown": 0, "passing-interception": 0, "rusing-yards": 0}}

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

sys_msg:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
prompt:

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.

You are a helpful assistant tasked with analyzing sports games. You have been given a play-by-play breakdown of a NFL football game between two teams.

The "Play" column describes the action that happened at the respective times. It provides details of specific plays, movements, and outcomes on the court.

Team players are listed in two rows, each row representing one of the two football teams involved in the game.
